description: This source file contains Python test code using pytest for testing a Nuxt.js project template system. It includes fixtures for setting up mock project templates and configurations, and test functions verifying template initialization, project creation, script execution, configuration loading, and variable replacement within files.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Fixture that creates a temporary directory for test outputs, cleans up after test.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture that creates a mock Nuxt template directory with config and sample files.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture that creates a sample ProjectConfig instance for testing.

methods.name: test_nuxt_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that template initialization info loads correctly, especially the environment command.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Checks that a Nuxt project is correctly initialized and output files contain expected content.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Tests that post-processing scripts are executed, e.g., by creating a marker file.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Tests loading of project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Ensures variables in template files are properly replaced with project config values.
